channel.title: CVE Feed for DELL EMC -- Dell EMC Enterprise Copy Data Management (eCDM)

item.title: CVE-2019-3751|2024-08-04T19:19:18.413Z -- dell%20emc -- dell%20emc%20enterprise%20copy%20data%20management%20%28ecdm%29
item.description: Dell EMC Enterprise Copy Data Management (eCDM) versions 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.1, and 3.0 contain a certificate validation vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker may potentially exploit this vulnerability to carry out a man-in-the-middle attack by supplying a crafted certificate and intercepting the victim's traffic to view or modify a victimâ€™s data in transit.
